entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
